function to normalize a specific kind of VDJ gene in feature space

dot-normalizePerVDJ.Rd

function to normalize a specific kind of VDJ gene in feature space

Usage

.normalizePerVDJ(
  pseudo_vdj_feature,
  col_n,
  renormalize,
  define.mask,
  milo,
  min_count
)

Arguments

pseudo_vdj_feature

constructed feature space

col_n

name of column to extract the VDJ information

renormalize

Whether to renormalize the matrix

define.mask

logical vector determine whether the V/D/J gene should be masked when normalizing

milo

Milo or SingleCellExperiment object provided by user

min_count

the minim count of a V/D/J gene

Value

feature space normalized on specifed V/D/J gene
